/* CompanyApplyMapper.ListCompanyApply */
SELECT CA.COMPANY_APPLY_ID, CA.REGISTRATION_NO, CA.CORPORATE_NAME, CA.COMPANY_NAME, CA.APPLY_CONTENT, CA.APPLY_STATE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS APPLY_STATE_CODE_NAME, CA.APPLICANT_ID, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS APPLICANT_NAME, CA.APPLY_DT FROM HM_COMPANY_APPLY CA LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = CA.APPLY_STATE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'APPLY_STATE_00' INNER JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = CA.APPLICANT_ID ORDER BY CA.APPLY_DT DESC

/* CompanyApplyMapper.UpdateCompanyApply */
UPDATE HM_COMPANY_APPLY SET APPLY_STATE_CODE = @ApplyStateCode, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE COMPANY_APPLY_ID = @CompanyApplyId
